des: "Two types of barbeque sauce are blended into a rich mixture that's great on any kind of meat. Make it up to a week in advance -- it tastes better the longer it sits."
ins: In a large saucepan over medium heat, mix honey barbeque sauce, barbeque sauce, butter, brown sugar, Worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper and water as needed. Cook 10 minutes, or until butter is melted.
